crimes.name: murder
crimes.description: The intentional killing of another person with malice aforethought.

crimes.name: theft
crimes.description: The act of dishonestly taking movable property out of the possession of another person without their consent.

crimes.name: robbery
crimes.description: Theft with force or threat of force, causing fear of death or hurt.

crimes.name: cheating
crimes.description: Fraudulently or dishonestly inducing a person to deliver any property or valuable security.

crimes.name: assault
crimes.description: Use of criminal force to cause injury, harm, or criminal intimidation to another person.

crimes.name: kidnapping
crimes.description: Taking or enticing a person away from their lawful guardianship without consent.

crimes.name: rape
crimes.description: Sexual assault or non-consensual sexual intercourse, including aggravated forms and sexual offenses against minors.

crimes.name: criminal intimidation
crimes.description: Threatening another with injury to person, reputation or property to cause alarm.

crimes.name: forgery
crimes.description: Making a false document or electronic record with intent to cause damage or injury.

crimes.name: criminal breach of trust
crimes.description: Dishonestly misappropriating or converting property entrusted to oneself.

crimes.name: cyber fraud
crimes.description: Fraudulent activities conducted through electronic means or the internet.

crimes.name: drug trafficking
crimes.description: Illegal trade, transportation, or distribution of controlled substances.
